An elderly spinster living in the village of St. Mary Mead, helps her friends and relatives solve mysterious murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1734537/","name":"Agatha Christie's Marple","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDdhMzBlOWEtOWZiYi00NzRmLTgxMTktZDBkOWY0NmI5ODc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elderly spinster living in the village of St. Mary Mead, helps her friends and relatives solve mysterious murders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1734537/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"versions","reviewBody":"The key for taste this serie , in my case, was to ignore the portrait of Miss Marple created by Agatha Christie. because each actress in this role, gives her nuances and colors and accents to it. so, the war was between Geraldine Mc Ewan and Julia McKenzie. both are admirable. the difference - maybe the manner to define the character. in the case of lady McEwan , the good intention was the lead aspect. the hard try to give to her character consistence. the result was decent and honorable. Julia McKenzie propose, maybe, a more familiar version. more comfortable. and , at first sigh, more inspired."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7246,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2004-12-12","keywords":"united kingdom,murder,detective,female detective,england","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568603/","name":"Geraldine McEwan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571549/","name":"Julia McKenzie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161410/","name":"Stephen Churchett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104279/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103605/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041824/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Agatha Christie's Marple: The Julia McKenzie Collection","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4158173977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA0OWUwNDEtNjBmMS00OTQ4LThmOWItYTBkNDY4M2RhYWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA0OWUwNDEtNjBmMS00OTQ4LThmOWItYTBkNDY4M2RhYWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Agatha Christie's Marple: The Julia McKenzie Collection"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"llawrance1972","dateCreated":"2010-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun, yet thoughtful show.","reviewBody":"I caught 'The Murdoch Mysteries' by accident while drifting around the satellite channels and was instantly hooked. A well performed, touching and interesting show caught my eye. The characters are involving, are worth caring about and have a strong sense of purpose. Each one brings something to the mix and adds their own skills to the events of each episode. Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. It is also very reassuring to not have modern day morality thrust into the past as happens so frequently with other shows (yes 'Dr Quinn Medicine Woman', I mean you), dealing with the nineteenth century. Instead we are allowed to explore the world as they see it, enjoying the discoveries and trying to find a way forward into a new century. Well done to all concerned and long may it continue.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. It is also very reassuring to not have modern day morality thrust into the past as happens so frequently with other shows (yes 'Dr Quinn Medicine Woman', I mean you), dealing with the nineteenth century. Instead we are allowed to explore the world as they see it, enjoying the discoveries and trying to find a way forward into a new century. Well done to all concerned and long may it continue.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"llawrance1972"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun, yet thoughtful show.","reviewBody":"I caught 'The Murdoch Mysteries' by accident while drifting around the satellite channels and was instantly hooked. A well performed, touching and interesting show caught my eye. The characters are involving, are worth caring about and have a strong sense of purpose. Each one brings something to the mix and adds their own skills to the events of each episode. Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. It is also very reassuring to not have modern day morality thrust into the past as happens so frequently with other shows (yes 'Dr Quinn Medicine Woman', I mean you), dealing with the nineteenth century. Instead we are allowed to explore the world as they see it, enjoying the discoveries and trying to find a way forward into a new century. Well done to all concerned and long may it continue.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 6881870, Title: Frankie Drake Mysteries, --- Description: Frankie Drake Mysteries: Created by Carol Hay, Michelle Ricci, Cal Coons. With Lauren Lee Smith, Chantel Riley, Rebecca Liddiard, Sharron Matthews. The series follows Frankie Drake, a female private detective operating in Toronto in the 1920s." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6881870/","name":"Frankie Drake Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjY5ZTk1NjAtOTdlNS00ODczLTk2MTItZTcwMGNjZDhiMjQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU3MTc5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The series follows Frankie Drake, a female private detective operating in Toronto in the 1920s.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6881870/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jazfro","dateCreated":"2017-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"a good idea, but they could have done so much better","reviewBody":"I read the synopsis on IMDb, and I thought this could be a worthy Canadian answer to the very successful and enjoyable Australian series Miss Fischer's -same premise of a female private detective in the 1920s. Unfortunately, Frankie ain't no Phryne. The main character lacks the drive and personality one would expect from a female detective in an 1920s male dominated environment. Indeed, aside from very soft references to prohibition and slavery (in that order) the series appears to ignore the social references and culture of the times, and the aforementioned 1920s female detective appears to glide through unencumbered, except for the very soft and predictable love interest from the local news hack. Hardly believable, and only suitable for a kid's series. It's a shame, the period locations, sets and costumes were enjoyable, and the supporting cast was OK. But if the script and the main character are not up to scratch, then you can only produce a mediocre piece. CBC wasted their money on this one. Don't waste your time.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2017-11-06","keywords":"toronto canada,investigation,mother daughter relationship,female partner,crime solving","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809049/","name":"Lauren Lee Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6698172/","name":"Chantel Riley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4428734/","name":"Rebecca Liddiard"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0330410/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086650/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370474/","name":"Carol Hay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3687965/","name":"Michelle Ricci","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Frankie Drake: Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3482828569","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk5NjFmYjUtMzljMy00Y2JiLTk4OGMtNDQ3ZTg2MzUxZjA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk5NjFmYjUtMzljMy00Y2JiLTk4OGMtNDQ3ZTg2MzUxZjA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 3636060, Title: Poldark, --- Description: Poldark: Created by Debbie Horsfield. With Aidan Turner, Eleanor Tomlinson, Jack Farthing, Beatie Edney. Ross Poldark returns home after American Revolutionary War and rebuilds his life with a new business venture, making new enemies and finding a new love where he least expects it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3636060/","name":"Poldark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGIwYTY5OWQtYjgyNy00YWMwLWI3N2ItNGQ1MDYxNzlmMTY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ross Poldark returns home after American Revolutionary War and rebuilds his life with a new business venture, making new enemies and finding a new love where he least expects it.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3636060/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janene777-96-753312","dateCreated":"2015-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cinematography, Acting, Writing 9+","reviewBody":"Rarely do I find a tale that so draws me in and that is because the story is elegant and gritty, actors outstanding, and scenery simply stunning! The word, "noble" means something and not all noblemen demonstrate it. The relationships are not predictable, nor the storyline which shows the desperation of those who scrape by--mostly with honor--and some not troubled by honor but wealth. From our first introduction to Ross, he shows his character and it is impossible not to care about him the way he cares about those in his life. I rate it higher than even Downton Abbey, which I have followed with dedication, as I will with Poldark. I hope it is around for a decade at least!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28384,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2015-03-08","keywords":"england,mine,period drama,country life,18th century","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2636108/","name":"Aidan Turner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1870434/","name":"Eleanor Tomlinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4958046/","name":"Jack Farthing"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221332/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395425/","name":"Debbie Horsfield"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Poldark","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1838201625","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRlOTljNTYtMDIwMi00NWY4LWE5NjUtODIwYjQ0NTc0ZmE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRlOTljNTYtMDIwMi00NWY4LWE5NjUtODIwYjQ0NTc0ZmE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ross Poldark returns from the war to his beloved Cornwall to find his world in ruins."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 8417308, Title: The Spanish Princess, --- Description: The Spanish Princess: Created by Emma Frost, Matthew Graham. With Laura Carmichael, Aaron Cobham, Charlotte Hope, Stephanie Levi-John. The beautiful Spanish princess, Catherine of Aragon, navigates the royal lineage of England with an eye on the throne." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8417308/","name":"The Spanish Princess","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQwNzYyYjItZGQ3OC00ZWJkLWE2Y2UtZjE2NWZjZGU5N2QyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The beautiful Spanish princess, Catherine of Aragon, navigates the royal lineage of England with an eye on the throne.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8417308/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"paul_bibby","dateCreated":"2019-06-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Phillipa Gregory's Continuing History of England Part 3","reviewBody":"Like the other Starz shows, The White Princess & The White Queen, this production is lavish and high in value. It is undoubtedly cleaner than the real 16th Century world but has the feeling of authenticity about it.

There are some horrendous historical liberties taken by the producers. Arthur & Catherine were 15 when they married. Arthur died before his 16th birthday. Henry was 10, going on 11, over the 6 months of Catherine's marriage. Given most of the series is about Henry & Catherine's relationship the producers saw fit to make Henry & Arthur a similar age, maybe 18 & 19, respectively. Fair enough, but it does ensure a divergence from the historical facts, which is a pity.

The other and maybe more relevant fact is why Catherine was chosen to be the wife of the English heir male. She was descended from the legitimate English Lancastrian line via her mother. She had a stronger claim to the English throne than Henry VII, who was descended from an illigitimate Lancastrian line. The male offspring of Catherine would legitimise the Tudor dynasty. For this reason Henry VII, his wife & his mother would be moving heaven & earth to keep Catherine in England. Indeed, she became a virtual prisoner of the English crown for 7 years before she married her brother in law, the young Henry.

Overall, the historical costume drama is enjoyable enough and given it's only 10 episodes makes it easy enough to watch.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6575,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2019-05-04","keywords":"monarchy,arranged marriage,16th century,starz,royalty","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3882295/","name":"Laura Carmichael","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4704866/","name":"Aaron Cobham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3745225/","name":"Charlotte Hope"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0687726/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022057/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0361727/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296491/","name":"Emma Frost","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334213/","name":"Matthew Graham"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch Season 2 on STARZ","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2810495257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE0OTdjZGQtOGE2Mi00YmUwLTlmZTQtY2RjNDc3Y2VhNGNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE0OTdjZGQtOGE2Mi00YmUwLTlmZTQtY2RjNDc3Y2VhNGNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Spanish princess, Catherine of Aragon, navigates the royal lineage of England with an eye on the throne."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"llawrance1972","dateCreated":"2010-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun, yet thoughtful show.","reviewBody":"I caught 'The Murdoch Mysteries' by accident while drifting around the satellite channels and was instantly hooked. A well performed, touching and interesting show caught my eye. The characters are involving, are worth caring about and have a strong sense of purpose. Each one brings something to the mix and adds their own skills to the events of each episode. Each episode has a strong mystery to be solved, sometimes offering an intriguing moral dilemma to both Murdoch and the viewer. It is also very reassuring to not have modern day morality thrust into the past as happens so frequently with other shows (yes 'Dr Quinn Medicine Woman', I mean you), dealing with the nineteenth century. Instead we are allowed to explore the world as they see it, enjoying the discoveries and trying to find a way forward into a new century. Well done to all concerned and long may it continue.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12047,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Linz48"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"the Closer is the BEST TV Series to hit late night TV since Law and Order","reviewBody":"Dear TNT, I absolutely love Kyra Sedgwick. This part was made for her. I actually find myself laughing every time she ends her sentence with that little sarcastic "Thank You, thank ya-ll very much". She's adorable. It was great to see G.W Bailey cast as one of the cops. He is a terrific actor and is never given enough credit. He is very amusing as this character. I plan my Monday nights around THE CLOSER. I had recently seen an advertisement indicating that the series is only for the summer!!! Why would any network reel in an audience only to cut them off in September. This is a HIT series !!!!. Why is TNT not going forward with this fabulous show. And, most importantly, what am I going to do on Monday nights if this show ends.!!!! Please have someone re-consider keeping this show on the air. There are those of us out there who are educated and appreciate good TV: CSI, NYPD, Law and Order and THE CLOSER!!! We are sick of these mindless reality series, only made for idiots. Sincerely, Chris Lindsay R.N.C. in Poughkeepsie, NY"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. programme.title: Sherlock i Watson
programme.desc: Holmes i Watsonica istražuju otrovanje stručnjaka za preseljenje i otrkivaju da je desetljećima bio plaćeni ubojica. Watsonicin put do posvojenja nazaduje kad je posjeti socijalna radnica. Holmes i Watsonica istražuju otrovanje stručnjaka za preseljenje i otrkivaju da je desetljećima bio plaćeni ubojica. Watsonicin put do posvojenja nazaduje kad je posjeti socijalna radnica.

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Prideov otac, Cassius Pride, nađe se usred NCIS-ova slučaja koji uključuje neriješenu pljačku kasina koja se zbila nekoliko godina. Pride pak upoznaje člana obitelji za kojega i nije znao da postoji. Područni ured Navy CIS-a istražuje slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje u New Orleansu, odnosno "The Big Easyju", gradu poznatom po glazbi, zabavi i raskalašenosti. Grad je pravi magnet za vojnike na dopustu, a nakon previše opuštanja slijede nevolje.

programme.title: Sweat
Suton
programme.desc:
Sweat: Directed by Magnus von Horn. With Magdalena Kolesnik, Julian Swiezewski, Aleksandra Konieczna, Zbigniew Zamachowski. Three days in the life of fitness motivator Sylwia Zajac, a social media celebrity surrounded by loyal employees and admirers, who is really looking for true intimacy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12443946/","name":"Sweat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVkMzhiZDYtMzQxMy00NmJhLThhNDEtODJmNjE0ZDUxY2RhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjgxODk1MTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three days in the life of fitness motivator Sylwia Zajac, a social media celebrity surrounded by loyal employees and admirers, who is really looking for true intimacy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12443946/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"derek-duerden"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite Thought-Provoking","reviewBody":"Raising but not wholly dealing with a range of issues, this could be a good film to discuss with a group of friends that have all seen it.

Over and above the brutal "fitness" regime, being an always-on Instagram influencer looks like *very* hard work, and this film (and the lead actor) illustrates that excellently, in my view. Where I'm less sure about it is in the handling of the various side-issues... for example her relationship with her mother and the mall conversation with the schoolfriend - the latter was quite affecting but then they seemed to just "move on". Also, I'm sure that someone that glamorous and high-profile would attract more than one stalker... and I'm unsure about the handling of her culpability in what happens to him.

Nevertheless, it was more interesting than I expected and had a nice circular arc between the opening and closing scenes. Worth a look.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2014,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-03-12","keywords":"fitness class,instagram,stalker,mother daughter relationship,morning show","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"SWEAT international trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3678780953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU1ZWEyMjQtOTBmNy00YjUyLWI2MTYtYjllODk3ZmNjMDcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU1ZWEyMjQtOTBmNy00YjUyLWI2MTYtYjllODk3ZmNjMDcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5972800/","name":"Magdalena Kolesnik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6873940/","name":"Julian Swiezewski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1452458/","name":"Aleksandra Konieczna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3281319/","name":"Magnus von Horn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0349562/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0338571/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3281319/","name":"Magnus von Horn"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bull
Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Amy_cosmicchic86"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"So far, so good!","reviewBody":"Despite the rush of people on IMDb who seem strangely desperate to trash this new show; I personally, as a fan of procedural crime dramas and team "puzzle of the week" shows like House M.D, really quite enjoy Bull so far. The first episode had an intriguing premise, the second episode built up the team members' characters enough to at least make them likable, and I think Michael Weatherly is enjoying the role massively and it shows in his winning performance. The psychological aspect of the show is something I don't think we see enough of on television in general and even if some of it is pumped up into quick, flashy computer bites, it still aids the story which is really all it's meant to do. As shows in their infancy go, I think this one is off to a promising start. Bull is a well-shot bit of interesting fun and I will definitely keep watching!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16950,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Linz48"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"the Closer is the BEST TV Series to hit late night TV since Law and Order","reviewBody":"Dear TNT, I absolutely love Kyra Sedgwick. This part was made for her. I actually find myself laughing every time she ends her sentence with that little sarcastic "Thank You, thank ya-ll very much". She's adorable. It was great to see G.W Bailey cast as one of the cops. He is a terrific actor and is never given enough credit. He is very amusing as this character. I plan my Monday nights around THE CLOSER. I had recently seen an advertisement indicating that the series is only for the summer!!! Why would any network reel in an audience only to cut them off in September. This is a HIT series !!!!. Why is TNT not going forward with this fabulous show. And, most importantly, what am I going to do on Monday nights if this show ends.!!!! Please have someone re-consider keeping this show on the air. There are those of us out there who are educated and appreciate good TV: CSI, NYPD, Law and Order and THE CLOSER!!! We are sick of these mindless reality series, only made for idiots. Sincerely, Chris Lindsay R.N.C. in Poughkeepsie, NY"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Prideov otac, Cassius Pride, nađe se usred NCIS-ova slučaja koji uključuje neriješenu pljačku kasina koja se zbila nekoliko godina. Pride pak upoznaje člana obitelji za kojega i nije znao da postoji. Područni ured Navy CIS-a istražuje slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje u New Orleansu, odnosno "The Big Easyju", gradu poznatom po glazbi, zabavi i raskalašenosti. Grad je pravi magnet za vojnike na dopustu, a nakon previše opuštanja slijede nevolje.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: Dok se Jedinica za bihevioralnu analizu fokusira na ritualna ubojstva koja istražuju u Arizoni, bizarna veza unutar obitelji nepoznatog počinitelja mogla bi odvesti do konačnog pronalaska... Dok se Jedinica za bihevioralnu analizu fokusira na ritualna ubojstva koja istražuju u Arizoni, bizarna veza unutar obitelji nepoznatog počinitelja mogla bi odvesti do konačnog pronalaska osumnjičenika.

programme.title: Bull
Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Amy_cosmicchic86"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"So far, so good!","reviewBody":"Despite the rush of people on IMDb who seem strangely desperate to trash this new show; I personally, as a fan of procedural crime dramas and team "puzzle of the week" shows like House M.D, really quite enjoy Bull so far. The first episode had an intriguing premise, the second episode built up the team members' characters enough to at least make them likable, and I think Michael Weatherly is enjoying the role massively and it shows in his winning performance. The psychological aspect of the show is something I don't think we see enough of on television in general and even if some of it is pumped up into quick, flashy computer bites, it still aids the story which is really all it's meant to do. As shows in their infancy go, I think this one is off to a promising start. Bull is a well-shot bit of interesting fun and I will definitely keep watching!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16950,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Tim saznaje za osumnjičenog koji žrtvama uzima organe nakon što Prideova pomoćnica, Ginny Young, pobjegne otmičaru. Pride se obraća svom prijatelju, zapovjedniku i liječniku Calvinu Atkinsu, za... Tim saznaje za osumnjičenog koji žrtvama uzima organe nakon što Prideova pomoćnica, Ginny Young, pobjegne otmičaru. Pride se obraća svom prijatelju, zapovjedniku i liječniku Calvinu Atkinsu, za medicinske i duhovne smjernice dok se bori s posljedicama nedavnog bliskog susreta sa smrću.

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Linz48"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"the Closer is the BEST TV Series to hit late night TV since Law and Order","reviewBody":"Dear TNT, I absolutely love Kyra Sedgwick. This part was made for her. I actually find myself laughing every time she ends her sentence with that little sarcastic "Thank You, thank ya-ll very much". She's adorable. It was great to see G.W Bailey cast as one of the cops. He is a terrific actor and is never given enough credit. He is very amusing as this character. I plan my Monday nights around THE CLOSER. I had recently seen an advertisement indicating that the series is only for the summer!!! Why would any network reel in an audience only to cut them off in September. This is a HIT series !!!!. Why is TNT not going forward with this fabulous show. And, most importantly, what am I going to do on Monday nights if this show ends.!!!! Please have someone re-consider keeping this show on the air. There are those of us out there who are educated and appreciate good TV: CSI, NYPD, Law and Order and THE CLOSER!!! We are sick of these mindless reality series, only made for idiots. programme.title: Bull
Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Amy_cosmicchic86"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"So far, so good!","reviewBody":"Despite the rush of people on IMDb who seem strangely desperate to trash this new show; I personally, as a fan of procedural crime dramas and team "puzzle of the week" shows like House M.D, really quite enjoy Bull so far. The first episode had an intriguing premise, the second episode built up the team members' characters enough to at least make them likable, and I think Michael Weatherly is enjoying the role massively and it shows in his winning performance. The psychological aspect of the show is something I don't think we see enough of on television in general and even if some of it is pumped up into quick, flashy computer bites, it still aids the story which is really all it's meant to do. As shows in their infancy go, I think this one is off to a promising start. Bull is a well-shot bit of interesting fun and I will definitely keep watching!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16950,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Linz48"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"the Closer is the BEST TV Series to hit late night TV since Law and Order","reviewBody":"Dear TNT, I absolutely love Kyra Sedgwick. This part was made for her. I actually find myself laughing every time she ends her sentence with that little sarcastic "Thank You, thank ya-ll very much". She's adorable. It was great to see G.W Bailey cast as one of the cops. He is a terrific actor and is never given enough credit. He is very amusing as this character. I plan my Monday nights around THE CLOSER. I had recently seen an advertisement indicating that the series is only for the summer!!! Why would any network reel in an audience only to cut them off in September. This is a HIT series !!!!. Why is TNT not going forward with this fabulous show. And, most importantly, what am I going to do on Monday nights if this show ends.!!!! Please have someone re-consider keeping this show on the air. There are those of us out there who are educated and appreciate good TV: CSI, NYPD, Law and Order and THE CLOSER!!! We are sick of these mindless reality series, only made for idiots. Sincerely, Chris Lindsay R.N.C. in Poughkeepsie, NY"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Amy_cosmicchic86","dateCreated":"2016-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"So far, so good!","reviewBody":"Despite the rush of people on IMDb who seem strangely desperate to trash this new show; I personally, as a fan of procedural crime dramas and team "puzzle of the week" shows like House M.D, really quite enjoy Bull so far. The first episode had an intriguing premise, the second episode built up the team members' characters enough to at least make them likable, and I think Michael Weatherly is enjoying the role massively and it shows in his winning performance. The psychological aspect of the show is something I don't think we see enough of on television in general and even if some of it is pumped up into quick, flashy computer bites, it still aids the story which is really all it's meant to do. As shows in their infancy go, I think this one is off to a promising start. Bull is a well-shot bit of interesting fun and I will definitely keep watching!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16950,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Nakon smrtonosne eksplozije automobila u Francuskoj četvrti, tim ispituje profesora i bivšeg člana studentske protestne organizacije, a Tammy otkriva tajnu o Hanninu osobnom životu. Nakon smrtonosne eksplozije automobila u Francuskoj četvrti, tim ispituje profesora i bivšeg člana studentske protestne organizacije, a Tammy otkriva tajnu o Hanninu osobnom životu.

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. Glavni likovi ove mračno zabavne proceduralne drame su usko specijalizirana forenzična antropologinja dr. Brennan i agent FBI-a Seeley Booth. Oni surađuju u istragama ubojstava u kojima su standardne metode identifikacije tijela beskorisne.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: FBI
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Čovjek s planom
programme.desc: Adamova žena Andi počinje raditi pa on provodi više vremena s djecom i saznaje da su ti mali anđeli zapravo manijaci. Adamova žena Andi počinje raditi pa on provodi više vremena s djecom i saznaje da su ti mali anđeli zapravo manijaci. Kate je majstorica manipulacije, srednji Teddy stalno gura ruke u hlače, a najmlađa Emme boji se odlaska u vrtić.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.desc: Proceduralna drama "911" je brzi uvid u život i karijere ljudi u hitnim službama - policajci, bolničari, vatrogasci - ljudi koji svoj život stavljaju na kocku kako bi spasili druge. Autori Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk i Tim Minear ponovno promišljaju proceduralnu dramu hitne službe istražujući pritisak koji doživljavaju policajci, vatrogasci i dispečeri koji su pogurnuti u zastrašujuće, šokantne situacije od kojih staje srce.

credits.actor: Jonathan Tucker, Riann Steele, Norbert Leo Butz, Scroobius Pip, Tyrone Benskin, Jessica McLeod, Keenan Tracey, Aliyah O'Brien

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.desc: Bezbrižan život neženje i ženskaroša zavijek se promijeni nakon što se k njemu usele njegov brat i 10-godišnji nećak. Bezbrižan život neženje i ženskaroša zavijek se promijeni nakon što se k njemu usele njegov brat i 10-godišnji nećak.

credits.actor: Eliza Taylor, Paige Turco, Bob Morley, Marie Avgeropoulos, Lindsey Morgan, Richard Harmon, Tasya Teles, Shannon Kook

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. Glavni likovi ove mračno zabavne proceduralne drame su usko specijalizirana forenzična antropologinja dr. Brennan i agent FBI-a Seeley Booth. Oni surađuju u istragama ubojstava u kojima su standardne metode identifikacije tijela beskorisne.

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: FBI
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Clarice
Clarice
programme.desc:
Clarice: Created by Alex Kurtzman, Jenny Lumet. With Rebecca Breeds, Michael Cudlitz, Lucca De Oliveira, Nick Sandow. A look at the untold personal story of FBI agent Clarice Starling, as she returns to the field about a year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs (1991)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2177268/","name":"Clarice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM3NDBhMWMtODc5Mi00ZWY2LTgyNTgtNDAzNTIzNzhmMGE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the untold personal story of FBI agent Clarice Starling, as she returns to the field about a year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs (1991).","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2177268/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"midworld_traveller"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not the crown jewel of the franchise, but watchable.","reviewBody":"So if you forget the legend upon which this show is built, you are left with a good proceedural Gvt. Agency show, which is rare in these days of formulaic episodic cop propaganda; yes, they're borrowing heavily from the legend just by making the show, but it does make for a certain interesting undercurrent to everything.

The cast works well, the script isn't nearly as bad as the reviews suggest, nor is the production quality in any way lacking (I think everyone was hoping for film quality attention being paid to every detail, which isn't feasible, unless you're watching Hannibal, which raised the bar to an astonishing degree). A few less moth flashbacks, and we're good. My only strong complaint is the butchery done to Catherine Martin's character, and I don't know where that storyline is going, so I'm trying to reserve judgement.

Had to laugh at Clarice needing a better psychiatrist.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8026,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-02-11","keywords":"agent,fbi agent,female fbi agent,fbi investigation,investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2843024/","name":"Rebecca Breeds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191044/","name":"Michael Cudlitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040739/","name":"Jayne Atkinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500500/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0845375/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0845376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525886/","name":"Jenny Lumet"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi521126169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODdlNDVhYjktZTEyMC00MzkzLWI4YWYtZmNkODIyNWYxNmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODdlNDVhYjktZTEyMC00MzkzLWI4YWYtZmNkODIyNWYxNmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Set one year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs, join Agent Clarice Starling in this new psychological thriller that takes a deep dive into her untold personal story. programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. Glavni likovi ove mračno zabavne proceduralne drame su usko specijalizirana forenzična antropologinja dr. Brennan i agent FBI-a Seeley Booth. Oni surađuju u istragama ubojstava u kojima su standardne metode identifikacije tijela beskorisne.

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: FBI
Magnum P.I.
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"altereggo123"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wow. Shocking how bad this is. So disappointing!","reviewBody":"I expect a certain amount of political correctness from a Dick Wolf show. In Law & Order, it was common for the initial suspect--a low level hood from the ghetto--to be innocent, with the ultimate criminal turning out to be a wealthy white executive/headmaster/philanthropist/politician/stereotypical elitist. By now, I expect any crime show on any network in the US and the UK to have ethnically diverse investigators reporting to a female commander. But as long as the plots make sense and the serious dialogue is leavened with humor, I can put up with all the calibrated political correctness. I've watched a lot of these shows over the years, notwithstanding their occasional triteness.

This show is PC on steroids. It's is the first show I've ever seen in which MS-13 members are victims. There is a point where the political messaging just gets so tiresome and tendentious that it results in ridiculous plots, terrible dialogue, and total inauthenticity.

I hoped this show would be entertaining even if it wasn't exactly Masterpiece-just ordinary, decent TV. Instead. it is so stupid that it's unwatchable. How could a show with its pedigree go so wrong?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13074,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Posljednji čovjek na Zemlji
programme.desc: Posljednji čovjek na zemlji nova je komedija o životu i pustolovinama posljednjeg čovjeka na Zemlji. Posljednji čovjek na zemlji nova je komedija o životu i pustolovinama posljednjeg čovjeka na Zemlji. Phil Miller (Forte) bio je prosječan čovjek koji je volio svoju obitelj i mrzio svoj posao, a sada je posljednja nada čovječanstva.

programme.desc:
Clarice: Created by Alex Kurtzman, Jenny Lumet. With Rebecca Breeds, Michael Cudlitz, Lucca De Oliveira, Nick Sandow. A look at the untold personal story of FBI agent Clarice Starling, as she returns to the field about a year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs (1991)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2177268/","name":"Clarice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM3NDBhMWMtODc5Mi00ZWY2LTgyNTgtNDAzNTIzNzhmMGE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the untold personal story of FBI agent Clarice Starling, as she returns to the field about a year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs (1991).","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2177268/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"midworld_traveller"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not the crown jewel of the franchise, but watchable.","reviewBody":"So if you forget the legend upon which this show is built, you are left with a good proceedural Gvt. Agency show, which is rare in these days of formulaic episodic cop propaganda; yes, they're borrowing heavily from the legend just by making the show, but it does make for a certain interesting undercurrent to everything.

The cast works well, the script isn't nearly as bad as the reviews suggest, nor is the production quality in any way lacking (I think everyone was hoping for film quality attention being paid to every detail, which isn't feasible, unless you're watching Hannibal, which raised the bar to an astonishing degree). A few less moth flashbacks, and we're good. My only strong complaint is the butchery done to Catherine Martin's character, and I don't know where that storyline is going, so I'm trying to reserve judgement.

Had to laugh at Clarice needing a better psychiatrist.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8026,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-02-11","keywords":"agent,fbi agent,female fbi agent,fbi investigation,investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2843024/","name":"Rebecca Breeds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191044/","name":"Michael Cudlitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040739/","name":"Jayne Atkinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500500/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0845375/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0845376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525886/","name":"Jenny Lumet"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi521126169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODdlNDVhYjktZTEyMC00MzkzLWI4YWYtZmNkODIyNWYxNmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODdlNDVhYjktZTEyMC00MzkzLWI4YWYtZmNkODIyNWYxNmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Set one year after the events of The Silence of the Lambs, join Agent Clarice Starling in this new psychological thriller that takes a deep dive into her untold personal story. programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. Glavni likovi ove mračno zabavne proceduralne drame su usko specijalizirana forenzična antropologinja dr. Brennan i agent FBI-a Seeley Booth. Oni surađuju u istragama ubojstava u kojima su standardne metode identifikacije tijela beskorisne.
