programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

Proceduralna drama "911" je brzi uvid u život i karijere ljudi u hitnim službama - policajci, bolničari, vatrogasci - ljudi koji svoj život stavljaju na kocku kako bi spasili druge. Autori Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk i Tim Minear ponovno promišljaju proceduralnu dramu hitne službe istražujući pritisak koji doživljavaju policajci, vatrogasci i dispečeri koji su pogurnuti u zastrašujuće, šokantne situacije od kojih staje srce.

programme.title: Mladi Rock
programme.desc: Od globalne zvijezde Dwaynea "Rocka" Johnsona dolazi serija Mladi Rock, hrabra i srčana nova komedija koja se temelji na nevjerojatnim pričama iz njegovih mladih dana. Od globalne zvijezde Dwaynea "Rocka" Johnsona dolazi serija Mladi Rock, hrabra i srčana nova komedija koja se temelji na nevjerojatnim pričama iz njegovih mladih dana.

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: Nakon Charliejeve smrti, milijarder Walden useljava se u kuću na plaži s Alanom i Jakeom. Depresivan, Walden se oslanja na Alana koji će ga trenirati. "Dva i pol muškarca" prikazuje život dvojice braće, sina/nećaka i mnoštva žena koje ih okružuju. Točnije, Charlie Harper dobrostojeći je neženja s kućom na obali, Mercedesom u garaži i znanjem vještog ophođenja sa ženama. Ali njegov opušteni život u Malibuu ometaju njegov ukočeni i napeti brat Alan i Alanov sin Jake, koji već godinama žive kod njega. Unatoč kompleksnosti njihovih života i njihovim međusobnim napetim odnosima, Charlie i Alan jedno imaju zajedničko: obojica vole Jakea i žele mu samo najbolje. Zato uspijevaju stvoriti malu obiteljsku zajednicu u kojoj bi svatko od njih mogao postati bolji čovjek.

programme.title: Hart of Dixie
Južnjačko srce
programme.desc: Hart of Dixie: Created by Leila Gerstein. With Rachel Bilson, Jaime King, Cress Williams, Wilson Bethel. New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1832979/","name":"Hart of Dixie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDU1MzQ3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk2NzQzNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1832979/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mean-girl-3"},"dateCreated":"2012-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bluebell is the new Starshollow","reviewBody":"What do I expect from this kind of series? - That I come home after a long day and be able to relax, enjoy sometimes maybe a bit cliché story and laugh at the occasional jokes. Do I need a unique story that has never been told before and a superb acting from the protagonists? No. With that being said, Hart of Dixie is THE series for a rainy day. While for someone mediocre, it is better than the majority of soap operas currently on air. I enjoy the distinctive town of Bluebell very much, reminds me so much of Gilmore Girls' Starshollow! The setting has a rather specific atmosphere, feels like living in the 1950s sometimes. Plus, I have always been a fan of underdogs like Wade. This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! Grey's Anatomy has everything: drama, comedy, mystery, scandal and thrill."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277714,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1578873/","name":"Pretty Little Liars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDYzMzQ2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE3MzU4MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1578873/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"enemari"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really addictive, can't wait for another episode","reviewBody":"I find this series to be a bit funny, mostly kinda sad, but very entertaining. 

It starts off with 5 girls - Spencer, Hanna, Aria, Emily and Alison. Mystically Alison disappears one night while all of them were out in a barn, having fun. 

So a year later her body was found and investigation started. Not much later those 4 other girls started getting text messages from Alison, or so it seemed. Also the investigation is fun to observe + those messages make things really weird and spooky, but very addictive and catchy. 

Hoping to find out what happened to Alison soon enough.

I must say I'm a total fan of this series, tho it might not be the best one out there, but addicted and loving it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-06-08","keywords":"neo noir,murder,stalker,torture,kidnapping","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069079/","name":"Troian Bellisario"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1667364/","name":"Ashley Benson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1423955/","name":"Lucy Hale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050794/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454783/","name":"I. Čikaška hitna
programme.desc:
Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, Oliver Platt, S. Epatha Merkerson. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pietclausen"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just started watching","reviewBody":"A friend recommended me this series and I took the bite. Without reading anything about this medical series, nor reading any reviews on IMDb, I hasten to give my opinion.

Having seen 8 episodes thus far (season 1) I am thrilled about the cases presented in this busy hospital and the humanity and drama portrayed, making excellent watchable stories, causing one to think about life itself.

Without any prejudice I give it my rating of 7, before I read how other viewers experience this series.

Definitely one of the better series carrying the Chicago prefix!

Update: The more episodes I watch, the more I appreciate this series. I'm almost up to date and it's time to rate this 8.

2nd Update: Continues to be excellent; fine to re-rate this series to 9.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001624/","name":"Oliver Platt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631709/","name":"Matt Olmstead"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chicago Med: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2863249433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Premiere Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Horse
Dr. House
programme.desc:
Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316179/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543283/","name":"Harold Manning"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pietclausen"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just started watching","reviewBody":"A friend recommended me this series and I took the bite. Without reading anything about this medical series, nor reading any reviews on IMDb, I hasten to give my opinion.

Having seen 8 episodes thus far (season 1) I am thrilled about the cases presented in this busy hospital and the humanity and drama portrayed, making excellent watchable stories, causing one to think about life itself.

Without any prejudice I give it my rating of 7, before I read how other viewers experience this series.

Definitely one of the better series carrying the Chicago prefix!

Update: The more episodes I watch, the more I appreciate this series. I'm almost up to date and it's time to rate this 8.

2nd Update: Continues to be excellent; fine to re-rate this series to 9.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001624/","name":"Oliver Platt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631709/","name":"Matt Olmstead"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chicago Med: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2863249433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Premiere Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316179/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543283/","name":"Harold Manning"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gidget234"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"This show is G-O-O-D!","reviewBody":"The 2nd Season of "Greys Anatomy" has commenced and it is just as great as the 1st Season! This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! Grey's Anatomy has everything: drama, comedy, mystery, scandal and thrill."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277714,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, Oliver Platt, S. Epatha Merkerson. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pietclausen"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just started watching","reviewBody":"A friend recommended me this series and I took the bite. Without reading anything about this medical series, nor reading any reviews on IMDb, I hasten to give my opinion.

Having seen 8 episodes thus far (season 1) I am thrilled about the cases presented in this busy hospital and the humanity and drama portrayed, making excellent watchable stories, causing one to think about life itself.

Without any prejudice I give it my rating of 7, before I read how other viewers experience this series.

Definitely one of the better series carrying the Chicago prefix!

Update: The more episodes I watch, the more I appreciate this series. I'm almost up to date and it's time to rate this 8.

2nd Update: Continues to be excellent; fine to re-rate this series to 9.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001624/","name":"Oliver Platt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631709/","name":"Matt Olmstead"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chicago Med: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2863249433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Premiere Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316179/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543283/","name":"Harold Manning"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Pretty Little Liars: Created by I. Marlene King. With Troian Bellisario, Ashley Benson, Lucy Hale, Shay Mitchell. Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1578873/","name":"Pretty Little Liars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDYzMzQ2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE3MzU4MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1578873/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"enemari"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really addictive, can't wait for another episode","reviewBody":"I find this series to be a bit funny, mostly kinda sad, but very entertaining. 

It starts off with 5 girls - Spencer, Hanna, Aria, Emily and Alison. Mystically Alison disappears one night while all of them were out in a barn, having fun. 

So a year later her body was found and investigation started. Not much later those 4 other girls started getting text messages from Alison, or so it seemed. Also the investigation is fun to observe + those messages make things really weird and spooky, but very addictive and catchy. 

Hoping to find out what happened to Alison soon enough.

I must say I'm a total fan of this series, tho it might not be the best one out there, but addicted and loving it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-06-08","keywords":"neo noir,murder,stalker,torture,kidnapping","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069079/","name":"Troian Bellisario"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1667364/","name":"Ashley Benson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1423955/","name":"Lucy Hale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050794/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454783/","name":"I. programme.title: Hart of Dixie
Južnjačko srce
programme.desc: Hart of Dixie: Created by Leila Gerstein. With Rachel Bilson, Jaime King, Cress Williams, Wilson Bethel. New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1832979/","name":"Hart of Dixie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDU1MzQ3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk2NzQzNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1832979/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mean-girl-3"},"dateCreated":"2012-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bluebell is the new Starshollow","reviewBody":"What do I expect from this kind of series? - That I come home after a long day and be able to relax, enjoy sometimes maybe a bit cliché story and laugh at the occasional jokes. Do I need a unique story that has never been told before and a superb acting from the protagonists? No. With that being said, Hart of Dixie is THE series for a rainy day. While for someone mediocre, it is better than the majority of soap operas currently on air. I enjoy the distinctive town of Bluebell very much, reminds me so much of Gilmore Girls' Starshollow! The setting has a rather specific atmosphere, feels like living in the 1950s sometimes. Plus, I have always been a fan of underdogs like Wade. Definitely worth giving a try.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50099,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-09-26","keywords":"fish out of water,doctor,female doctor,small town,female protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1377375/","name":"Rachel Bilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454809/","name":"Jaime King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930317/","name":"Cress Williams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0299663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1771570/","name":"Leila Gerstein"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hart Of Dixie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2390932761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hart Of Dixie"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
Uvod u anatomiju
programme.desc:
Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gidget234"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"This show is G-O-O-D!","reviewBody":"The 2nd Season of "Greys Anatomy" has commenced and it is just as great as the 1st Season! This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! It starts off with 5 girls - Spencer, Hanna, Aria, Emily and Alison. Mystically Alison disappears one night while all of them were out in a barn, having fun. 

So a year later her body was found and investigation started. Not much later those 4 other girls started getting text messages from Alison, or so it seemed. Also the investigation is fun to observe + those messages make things really weird and spooky, but very addictive and catchy. 

Hoping to find out what happened to Alison soon enough.

I must say I'm a total fan of this series, tho it might not be the best one out there, but addicted and loving it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-06-08","keywords":"neo noir,murder,stalker,torture,kidnapping","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069079/","name":"Troian Bellisario"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1667364/","name":"Ashley Benson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1423955/","name":"Lucy Hale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050794/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454783/","name":"I. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pietclausen"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just started watching","reviewBody":"A friend recommended me this series and I took the bite. Without reading anything about this medical series, nor reading any reviews on IMDb, I hasten to give my opinion.

Having seen 8 episodes thus far (season 1) I am thrilled about the cases presented in this busy hospital and the humanity and drama portrayed, making excellent watchable stories, causing one to think about life itself.

Without any prejudice I give it my rating of 7, before I read how other viewers experience this series.

Definitely one of the better series carrying the Chicago prefix!

Update: The more episodes I watch, the more I appreciate this series. I'm almost up to date and it's time to rate this 8.

2nd Update: Continues to be excellent; fine to re-rate this series to 9.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001624/","name":"Oliver Platt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631709/","name":"Matt Olmstead"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chicago Med: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2863249433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Premiere Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Horse
Dr. House
programme.desc:
Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316179/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543283/","name":"Harold Manning"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1690455, Title: Dark Horse, --- Description: Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm","dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. programme.desc:
Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, Oliver Platt, S. Epatha Merkerson. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pietclausen"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just started watching","reviewBody":"A friend recommended me this series and I took the bite. Without reading anything about this medical series, nor reading any reviews on IMDb, I hasten to give my opinion.

Having seen 8 episodes thus far (season 1) I am thrilled about the cases presented in this busy hospital and the humanity and drama portrayed, making excellent watchable stories, causing one to think about life itself.

Without any prejudice I give it my rating of 7, before I read how other viewers experience this series.

Definitely one of the better series carrying the Chicago prefix!

Update: The more episodes I watch, the more I appreciate this series. I'm almost up to date and it's time to rate this 8.

2nd Update: Continues to be excellent; fine to re-rate this series to 9.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001624/","name":"Oliver Platt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1631709/","name":"Matt Olmstead"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chicago Med: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2863249433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1MmY5ZDYtNzM0Mi00OWU5LWIxYjYtODA1ZTlhY2FlMzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Premiere Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. IMDb data; ttnr: 1690455, Title: Dark Horse, --- Description: Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm","dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pietclausen"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just started watching","reviewBody":"A friend recommended me this series and I took the bite. Without reading anything about this medical series, nor reading any reviews on IMDb, I hasten to give my opinion.

Having seen 8 episodes thus far (season 1) I am thrilled about the cases presented in this busy hospital and the humanity and drama portrayed, making excellent watchable stories, causing one to think about life itself.

Without any prejudice I give it my rating of 7, before I read how other viewers experience this series.

Definitely one of the better series carrying the Chicago prefix!

Update: The more episodes I watch, the more I appreciate this series. I'm almost up to date and it's time to rate this 8.

programme.title: Dark Horse
Dr. House
programme.desc:
Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. IMDb data; ttnr: 1690455, Title: Dark Horse, --- Description: Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm","dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316179/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543283/","name":"Harold Manning"],"duration":"PT1H26M"</script><metacontent="

It starts off with 5 girls - Spencer, Hanna, Aria, Emily and Alison. Mystically Alison disappears one night while all of them were out in a barn, having fun. 

So a year later her body was found and investigation started. Not much later those 4 other girls started getting text messages from Alison, or so it seemed. Also the investigation is fun to observe + those messages make things really weird and spooky, but very addictive and catchy. 

Hoping to find out what happened to Alison soon enough.

I must say I'm a total fan of this series, tho it might not be the best one out there, but addicted and loving it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158513,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-06-08","keywords":"neo noir,murder,stalker,torture,kidnapping","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069079/","name":"Troian Bellisario"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1667364/","name":"Ashley Benson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1423955/","name":"Lucy Hale"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050794/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454783/","name":"I. programme.title: Clash of the Titans
Sudar titana
programme.desc: Clash of the Titans: Directed by Louis Leterrier. With Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Jason Flemyng. Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0800320/","name":"Clash of the Titans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjg4MzU5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTA3NTUwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"scott-tomasso"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oh how the mighty titans have fallen","reviewBody":"I, being a huge fan of the original, was probably more excited to see this movie than anyone. And in 3-D no less. So...I walk into the theater with my 3-D glasses on my head, holding my $5 popcorn and get ready to watch my favorite childhood movie and...and...and...oh no. Oh no. This is awful. I sat through the movie wondering why I don't care about any of these characters. On top of that, I'm wondering why I spent the extra money to see it in 3-D. The best 3-D effects came during the opening credits. Other than that, I could have thrown the glasses away. Now I know why James Cameron is not a big fan of making films 3-D after the fact. To make a long story short, I was incredibly disappointed. I would not recommend this movie to anyone. Go see the original "Clash of the Titans" if you want to lose yourself in a good movie. After seeing this one all I could think of was "oh how the mighty titans have fallen."","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276512,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-04-14","keywords":"kraken,greek mythology,hand to hand combat,famous line,myth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Clash of the Titans: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626946073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0MDg4ODUwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0MDg4ODUwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Perseus (Worthington) who was born of a god but raised as a man, sets off on an epic mission to combat Hades (Fiennes) before he can seize power from Zeus (Neeson) and unleash hell on earth. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941777/","name":"Sam Worthington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504642/","name":"Louis Leterrier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2012438/","name":"Travis Beacham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006534/","name":"Phil Hay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542062/","name":"Matt Manfredi"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="
