Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0800320/","name":"Clash of the Titans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjg4MzU5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTA3NTUwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Perseus, a demigod and the son of Zeus, battles the minions of Hades and the Underworld in order to stop them from conquering Olympus and Earth.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800320/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"scott-tomasso","dateCreated":"2010-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oh how the mighty titans have fallen","reviewBody":"I, being a huge fan of the original, was probably more excited to see this movie than anyone. And in 3-D no less. So...I walk into the theater with my 3-D glasses on my head, holding my $5 popcorn and get ready to watch my favorite childhood movie and...and...and...oh no. Oh no. This is awful. I sat through the movie wondering why I don't care about any of these characters. On top of that, I'm wondering why I spent the extra money to see it in 3-D. The best 3-D effects came during the opening credits. Other than that, I could have thrown the glasses away. Now I know why James Cameron is not a big fan of making films 3-D after the fact. To make a long story short, I was incredibly disappointed. I would not recommend this movie to anyone. Go see the original "Clash of the Titans" if you want to lose yourself in a good movie. After seeing this one all I could think of was "oh how the mighty titans have fallen."","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276512,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-04-14","keywords":"kraken,greek mythology,hand to hand combat,famous line,myth","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Clash of the Titans: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626946073","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0MDg4ODUwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0MDg4ODUwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4ODYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Perseus (Worthington) who was born of a god but raised as a man, sets off on an epic mission to combat Hades (Fiennes) before he can seize power from Zeus (Neeson) and unleash hell on earth. programme.title: Hackers
Hakeri
programme.desc:
Hackers: Directed by Iain Softley. With Jonny Lee Miller, Angelina Jolie, Jesse Bradford, Matthew Lillard. Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113243/","name":"Hackers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmExMTkyYjItZTg0YS00NWYzLTkwMjItZWJiOWQ2M2ZkYjE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hackers are blamed for making a virus that will capsize five oil tankers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113243/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vestan_p"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best movie EVER!","reviewBody":"Well, here it is folks, I think it's been long enough since hackers came out (6 years+), so I am going to offer what I think will be the definitive commentary on the film "Hackers." Simply put, Hackers is the finest movie ever. The music, the costumes, the dialog... if you could put FUN in a box (not to mention Johnny Lee Miller and Angelina Jolie) the box would say "Hackers" on it. If this movie were a president, it would Hackraham Lincoln. If it were a gum, it would be Hackalicious... you get the picture.

Anyhow, the really important thing I have to say is this:

A.) Hackers is NOT a "B-movie"; the budget was large and the actors have major talent; it's a slick production, and it shows.

B.) Contrary to the belief of some cyber-dorks out there (who mainly get their jollies by pretending they know more than other people about computers) it doesn't matter if the computer interface is somewhat unrealistic. Obviously, there are some classic "movie" style computer screens (a la 1995's other horrible computer flick "The Net (of crap)"), but lest I seem like a broken record, I will repeat for the entertainmentally challenged THIS IS A MOVIE!

C.) Are you kidding me? This stuff is great! I can watch this movie forever (and believe me, I have) and NEVER EVER get tired of it. C'mon, this stuff is just classic, listen here to some dialogue:

(spoken with much gusto:) "Yeah, it's got a killer refresh rate."

"Risc is good."

"Never fear, I is here."

IT'S SO CLASSIC IT HURTS!

Bottom line, if you wanna be a nerd, go program something. If you want to be entertained, get this movie, NOW!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-09-15","keywords":"computer,computer virus,cyberpunk,hacker,fight the system","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001538/","name":"Jonny Lee Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103038/","name":"Jesse Bradford"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0812200/","name":"Iain Softley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021711/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604360/","name":"Rafael Moreu"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117060/","name":"Mission: Impossible","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NjI2MjU0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDk3ODYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117060/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mission Impossible","reviewBody":"Brian De Palma brings Mission: Impossible to the big screen in an explosive and action-packed adventure. Branded a trader when his team is killed during an intelligence operation, IMF agent Ethan Hunt goes rogue in order to clear his name. The plot's rather good, and does a fair job at building suspense and intrigue. Starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight, Emmanuelle Beart, and Ving Rhames, the casting's pretty solid. And, the action sequences are shot especially well, adding a lot of energy and intensity to the film. Danny Elfman's score is also excellently done. Incredibly entertaining, Mission: Impossible is a fun and thrilling action film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":404477,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1996-05-22","keywords":"train,betrayal,murder,based on tv show,famous score","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mission: Impossible","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3226468377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI2NjUyYjEtNzhiMy00ZGM4LTliNWQtM2ZkYjgwMGVmYjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI2NjUyYjEtNzhiMy00ZGM4LTliNWQtM2ZkYjgwMGVmYjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000685/","name":"Jon Voight"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000322/","name":"Emmanuelle Béart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000361/","name":"Brian De Palma"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012382/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312367/","name":"Bruce Geller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001873/","name":"Steven Zaillian"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Savršen muškarac
programme.desc:
The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kennedy63"},"dateCreated":"2007-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Engaging Excellent Entertainment","reviewBody":"After watching every episode of "The Closer" up to the current one (final episode Sept. 2007), I feel it's time for me to commend every aspect of this series about an elite homicide squad.

Deputy Chief Brenda Johnson (Kyra Segdewick) is consistently one of the most engaging television series characters I've seen in a very long time. She's the star but certainly not alone in delivering quite engaging, excellent characterization, and entertaining performances.

This series goes to show that today's television doesn't have to depict violence, gore, profanity, or much that older children couldn't watch. Yet, for an adult who likes Cronenberg's and Lynch's films, this clean cut show is quite interesting without being too 'vanilla'. 

Sedgewick has really come into her character by this third season and I like it far better than "24" which has now become monotonously predictable. There's no guessing what Deputy Chief Johnson will do to protect and close one of her cases!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24258,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Simmons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1556631/","name":"Corey Reynolds"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035643/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0294955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240384/","name":"James Duff"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fate Line - Clip #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3810788121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from an episode of "The Closer," which airs at 9 p.m. Mondays on TNT."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Strah i prijezir u Las Vegasu
programme.desc: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas: Directed by Terry Gilliam. With Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Tobey Maguire, Michael Lee Gogin. An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120669/","name":"Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA2ZDY3ZjYtZmNiMC00MDU5LTgxMWEtNzk1YmI3NzdkMTU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQyMjcwNDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120669/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daveisit"},"dateCreated":"2005-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slippery Mice","reviewBody":"This is far from your everyday movie, and only for those with a deep appreciation for the diversity of film-making, or fans of Hunter S. Thompson. This does not mean those mentioned will enjoy it, although definitely respect the attempt. I personally found it fascinating. To portray a permanently drug induced state to the big screen was done with creativity and subtle humour. You could expect nothing less from director Terry Gilliam who has played such a massive role in the brilliant and original Monty Python works. \n\nHaving never read any of Hunter S. Thompson's work, I get the impression that justice is done for the adaptation to the big screen. An absolutely quality cast must be credited for this, ensuring a natural performance is achieved. Las Vegas which features strongly throughout the movie seems to be so appropriate when dealing with this subject matter, they just seem to go hand in hand.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":269766,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1998-05-22","keywords":"1970s,drugs,hallucination,psychedelia,based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas: Criterion Collection","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2996149273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzk4NGQ4ZjItODE5My00MjNiLWE2NjYtMjNhYWE3OGY3YThkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzk4NGQ4ZjItODE5My00MjNiLWE2NjYtMjNhYWE3OGY3YThkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three Reasons Criterion Collection Trailer for Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001125/","name":"Benicio Del Toro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001497/","name":"Tobey Maguire"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000416/","name":"Terry Gilliam"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095293/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095294/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860219/","name":"Hunter S. programme.title: School for Scoundrels
Škola za frajere
programme.desc:
School for Scoundrels: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Billy Bob Thornton, Jon Heder, Jacinda Barrett, Michael Clarke Duncan. A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when it turns out his teacher has the same agenda." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462519/","name":"School for Scoundrels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDQ4NjMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDE0NzU3._V1_.jpg","description":"A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when it turns out his teacher has the same agenda.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462519/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"StevePulaski"},"dateCreated":"2014-01-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Its comedic heights are present, but its dramatic ones should not be shortchanged","reviewBody":"Roger (Jon Heder) is a meter-reader with little confidence and not a lot to live for. Browbeaten, verbally abused, and harassed by everyone in his life, he takes the advice of his close friend (David Cross) to take a self-esteem class taught by a man named "Dr. P" (Billy Bob Thornton), who is quickly found to be the kind of self-esteem teacher to teach you the ways of confidence and self-worth by providing you with even more verbal abuse in your life. Roger's ultimate goal - besides earning respect from others - is to win the heart of his neighbor, an Australian graduate student named Amanda (Jacinda Barrett), who he can't seem to talk to without being met with a panic attack or fainting.

Todd Phillips' School for Scoundrels is a remake of the 1960 film of the same name, which I can only imagine to be a bit nicer and less bossy in its tone and approach to its material. However, despite its over-arching mean-spiritedness as one of its themes, School for Scoundrels actually manages to be a consistently funny comedy, mostly thanks to its capable band of actors, all of whom have had some work in the comedy field and know just what to say and how to say it when the time is right.

For starters, consider Billy Bob Thornton, who is simply fearless as Dr. P here. Thornton has a way of assimilating well to any given role, be it a foul-mouthed mall-Santa, a questionable folk from the backwoods, or a browbeating self-esteem teacher. Thornton works well here because he's as brash and as off-color as the material, often assisted by his character's assistant "Lesher," played by Michael Clarke Duncan. Now consider Jon Heder who, before this, only got to show his skills in one of the most lackluster comedies of the last decade. Heder is a solid, sympathetic character here, especially for those who can see his characters' struggles and hunger for acceptance and are willing to buy into it. Some characters in films are the reason for their own problems (take virtually any Adam Sandler film from the nineties), but Heder's Roger is simply a bit geeky and a tad uncoordinated, and for that, is unfortunately the target for abuse and ridicule. On those notes alone, his character is easy to side with because he is relatively blameless.

Alongside Heder are the likes of Sarah Silverman as Amanda's friend who continues to give Roger a hard time, Horatio Sanz, Aziz Ansari, David Cross, Dan Fogler, Luis Guzmán, Jim Parsons, and Ben Stiller (however, in a role of questionable value), all of whom very competent comedians who accentuate the quick-witted qualities that got them to that level in the first place. While School for Scoundrels gets by almost entirely on the charisma of its actors, Todd Phillips and Scot Armstrong's writing shouldn't go unnoticed. For the most part, the writing duo create an unabashedly fun, silly comedy with enough consistent laughs to warrant a recommendation.

The only struggle for the film is how it wants to achieve its climax, in this case, making the entire "get the girl" subplot too silly and way too overblown. The film was grounded in a certain, goofy reality up until maybe the eighty-minute mark, and for that reason, the film becomes a bit of a struggle to continue to buy into during its last twenty-five minutes. Regardless, it can't derail the comedic talent at hand, along with Jon Heder's Roger, who, for once, isn't picked on because of his own stupidity but for his own genial manner and geeky appearance. He's a character I can see many identifying with.

Three years after the release of School for Scoundrels (which bombed at the box office and has now, eight years later, faded into almost complete obscurity), Todd Phillips hit a comedy homerun, financially, after directing all three Hangover films, effectively transcending his career into heavily-raunchy material and leaving geniality behind with School for Scoundrels. This is kind of an upsetting fact because this film has the unsung ability to identify when the two sequels leaching off the original Hangover were nothing but an annoyance to moviegoers. The film at hand rarely achieves comedic heights, but its dramatic ones are worth noting and appear to have been grossly shortchanged.

Starring: Billy Bob Thornton, Jon Heder, Jacinda Barrett, Sarah Silverman, Horatio Sanz, David Cross, Dan Fogler, Luis Guzmán, Ben Stiller, Jim Parsons, and Aziz Ansari. Directed by: Todd Phillips.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-29","keywords":"low self esteem,mace spray,new york city,australian,assertion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"School for Scoundrels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1043333913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNkYTU0YjEtMGJjYi00NzFjLWJhMjgtNjQ0Mzc1ODQ4ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNkYTU0YjEtMGJjYi00NzFjLWJhMjgtNjQ0Mzc1ODQ4ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Weinstein Co."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057150/","name":"Jacinda Barrett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0189495/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130439/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035905/","name":"Scot Armstrong"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156320/","name":"Hal E. Chester"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

Alongside Heder are the likes of Sarah Silverman as Amanda's friend who continues to give Roger a hard time, Horatio Sanz, Aziz Ansari, David Cross, Dan Fogler, Luis Guzmán, Jim Parsons, and Ben Stiller (however, in a role of questionable value), all of whom very competent comedians who accentuate the quick-witted qualities that got them to that level in the first place. While School for Scoundrels gets by almost entirely on the charisma of its actors, Todd Phillips and Scot Armstrong's writing shouldn't go unnoticed. For the most part, the writing duo create an unabashedly fun, silly comedy with enough consistent laughs to warrant a recommendation.

The only struggle for the film is how it wants to achieve its climax, in this case, making the entire "get the girl" subplot too silly and way too overblown. The film was grounded in a certain, goofy reality up until maybe the eighty-minute mark, and for that reason, the film becomes a bit of a struggle to continue to buy into during its last twenty-five minutes. Regardless, it can't derail the comedic talent at hand, along with Jon Heder's Roger, who, for once, isn't picked on because of his own stupidity but for his own genial manner and geeky appearance. He's a character I can see many identifying with.

Three years after the release of School for Scoundrels (which bombed at the box office and has now, eight years later, faded into almost complete obscurity), Todd Phillips hit a comedy homerun, financially, after directing all three Hangover films, effectively transcending his career into heavily-raunchy material and leaving geniality behind with School for Scoundrels. This is kind of an upsetting fact because this film has the unsung ability to identify when the two sequels leaching off the original Hangover were nothing but an annoyance to moviegoers. The film at hand rarely achieves comedic heights, but its dramatic ones are worth noting and appear to have been grossly shortchanged.

Starring: Billy Bob Thornton, Jon Heder, Jacinda Barrett, Sarah Silverman, Horatio Sanz, David Cross, Dan Fogler, Luis Guzmán, Ben Stiller, Jim Parsons, and Aziz Ansari. Directed by: Todd Phillips.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-29","keywords":"low self esteem,mace spray,new york city,australian,assertion","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"School for Scoundrels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1043333913","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNkYTU0YjEtMGJjYi00NzFjLWJhMjgtNjQ0Mzc1ODQ4ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNkYTU0YjEtMGJjYi00NzFjLWJhMjgtNjQ0Mzc1ODQ4ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Weinstein Co.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057150/","name":"Jacinda Barrett"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0189495/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130439/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035905/","name":"Scot Armstrong","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156320/","name":"Hal E. programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
Kako izdresirati zmaja
programme.desc:
How to Train Your Dragon: Directed by Dean DeBlois, Chris Sanders. With Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera. A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0892769/","name":"How to Train Your Dragon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5NDQyMjc2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjg5ODcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0892769/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Simon_Says_Movies"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Will enamour kids and enthrall adults","reviewBody":"With a somewhat unwieldy tile and the lack of the winning Pixar storyline that has dominated the Oscars for a decade, Dreamworks animations latest could have been a clunker. Not only is How to Train Your Dragon the best film of the year so far, but it even eclipses the quality of last years duel academy award winner Up.

The latest 3-D film to fly into theatres in so many weeks is also the best of its format (story wise), making Burton's overblown misfire Alice in Wonderland look even more pitiful. Dragon will no doubt enamour kids (excuse the cliché) of all ages while keeping parents not only awake but equally enthralled. This movie is sure to tug the hearts of anyone who has ever loved a pet and will undoubtedly draw tears from those who are so inclined.

The texture that can be created from today's CG technology never ceases to amaze. Consider a beautiful tracking shot of a downed dragon where the twisted wing that protrudes towards the screen is actually out of focus, as if you yourself were staring awestruck at the giant lizard that lay before you in real, tangible life. I did not have the pleasure to viewing How to Train Your Dragon in 3-D but I have heard great things and even without having paid a surcharge the film does in no way suffer as a result. The narrative, visuals, writing and voicework is ample reason to seek out Dragon and frankly is the real heart of the movie anyways.

On the Island of Berk, the Viking community that lives there does not fear a rival tribe, the weather or disease but rather a much more toothy threat: dragons. Nightly raids by the winged beasts have forged a great hatred upon the tribe and led by the aptly named Stoik the Vast (Gerard Butler) they wage war with the intent to rid themselves of dragons once and for all. This is not a feeling shared by Stoik's scrawny son Hiccup (Jay Baruchel) who favours non-lethal tactics as much as he does blacksmithing. Much to Hiccup's surprise, during one of the aforementioned raids he is able to down a dragon with one of his contraptions. Intent on proving his manhood to Stoik, he seeks out to find the dragon know as a Night Fury but finds himself unable to slay his scaly foe. So begins an unlikely and forbidden friendship with the later named Toothless that follows a time-tested but absolutely rewarding arc that is as enthralling as it is touching.

Joining Butler and Baruchel, both of whom give excellent performances (with Butler recapturing some of his 300 mojo), are the likes of Craig Fergusson as the Viking blacksmith, America Ferrera as the feisty object of Hiccup's affections and a whole slice of the Apatow gang including Kristen Wiig, Christopher Mintz-Plasse and Jonah Hill as other young warriors. Much like WALL-E, Toothless exhibits oodles of personality and is endlessly endearing. To achieve this level of depth is perhaps even more impressive due to the fact that he never utters a word and must emote through non-verbal means.

Along with Kung Fu Panda this movie represents the highest ilk of the Dreamworks repertoire and that is not a backhanded compliment by any means. Like Panda, there are thrilling and well choreographed action sequences to compliment the heart, and plenty of humour to keep this from becoming too much of a dramatic slog for younger theatre goers. Teenager or adult, fan or animation or not if you like truly good cinema, you will not be unsatisfied by How to Train Your Dragon.

Read all my reviews at simonsaysmovies.blogspot.com","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":697462,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2010-03-31","keywords":"dragon,viking,village,father son relationship,island","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How to Train Your Dragon: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1158218777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FiZDUxZTMtMzUxMi00NzYxLTg0NzEtNzViYTY4N2Y2MWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FiZDUxZTMtMzUxMi00NzYxLTg0NzEtNzViYTY4N2Y2MWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Viking Hiccup Horrendous Haddock the Third (voice of Jay Baruchel) is sent to the Isle of Berk in the North Sea, where he is to subdue a dragon as a rite of passage."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0059431/","name":"Jay Baruchel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2395586/","name":"Christopher Mintz-Plasse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213450/","name":"Dean DeBlois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0761498/","name":"Chris Sanders"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0266260/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084207/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204030/","name":"William Davies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213450/","name":"Dean DeBlois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0761498/","name":"Chris Sanders"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
Brzi i žestoki
programme.desc: The Fast and the Furious: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Paul Walker, Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster. Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0232500/","name":"The Fast and the Furious","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzlkNzVjMDMtOTdhZC00MGE1LTkxODctMzFmMjkwZmMxZjFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0232500/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daniel_velker"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hot Cars, Hot Girls, Hot Action, What more could you want?","reviewBody":"I don't remember when the first time was that I saw The Fast and the Furious but it dosen't matter because it gets better with each viewing. This movie is filled with what guys want to see; Hot and fast tricked out cars, beautiful women, and kick ass action sequences. The world that the characters live in in this film is the world we can only dream of, to race in cool tricked out cars with dozens of beautiful women surrounding you and cheering you on. All of this is what I love most about this film but I also love the cast; Vin Diesal, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster all clinch their roles. If I were to pick my favorite cast member I would have to go with Michelle Rodriguez because not only is she a talented actress she is beautiful and bad ass in everything she's ever been in and this is probably my favorite role of hers. This is a movie were you really don't have to care about the plot because all the eye-candy and fun of this movie is the cars, girls, and action which is enough to pull you into the driver's seat. The cars are fast the action is furious and that's why this movie rocks."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":369533,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2001-10-17","keywords":"undercover,robbery,street racing,hijacking,illegal street racing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Re-release Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2048898073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NDczNzAwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA2NzUwOTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NDczNzAwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA2NzUwOTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the re-release trailer for the movie that started it all, 'The Fast and the Furious.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0508446/","name":"Ken Li"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074980/","name":"Erik Bergquist"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
Brzi i žestoki: Tokio Drift
programme.desc:
The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift: Directed by Justin Lin. With Lucas Black, Damien Marzette, Trula M. Marcus, Zachery Ty Bryan. A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0463985/","name":"The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTMxODEyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDgxMjA0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0463985/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaCocoa"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No rats in buckets, no CGI, just an entertaining flick featuring excellent car racing","reviewBody":"Branching away from any original cast members of the first two films, thankfully, Tokyo Drift provides a refreshingly new look to the franchise.

Tokyo Drift is possibly my favourite of the series, or at least its up there with the first film; it only has a few problems that can be swept under the "It's Fast and the Furious, what do you expect" carpet. The story follows American "teenager" Sean Boswell (Lucas Black) whose reckless driving lands him prison time, but to avoid this he moves in with his father in Tokyo. He attempts to move on a dangerous rival's girl, and must become a competitor in the street racing's drifting scene.

I say "teenager" as that's what IMDb says, and he does go to school in the movie but honestly, he's the oldest teen I've ever seen. Along with every other "teen" in this movie! While I talk negatives, the majority of the film is set in Tokyo yet 95% of the dialogue is English and Sean has a knack of meeting every foreigner in the city. I don't mind this so much, but I fully expect all of the Japanese characters to speak Japanese, especially when Sean isn't present!

But, unlike 2 Fast 2 Furious (choke) this film actually cares for its characters and their personalities (as Sean says early on: "It's not about the ride, it's about the rider") from Sean's fish-out-of- water acceptance, to his mentor Han's closet of skeletons. The villain isn't ridiculous either, his uncle is part of the Yakuza and he has a serious "king of a little hill" problem. Again unlike 2 Fast 2 Furious (gag) the cars have never looked better, sleek and refined and the drifting action is spectacular, especially when synchronized. Plus, no CGI, just skilled professional drivers, making the film worth seeing solely for the racing.

There's no stupid Tyrese Gibson mugging at the camera, no rats in buckets, no CGI, just an entertaining (albeit poorly localized) flick featuring excellent car racing and professional stunts.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":258134,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-08-23","keywords":"yakuza,chase,showdown,dominic toretto character,han seoul oh character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Everything We Know About 'F9'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2943402009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk5ODI0YjUtN2VkYy00YTgyLTg5NGQtYmE1MzQ4MTVhOTA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk5ODI0YjUtN2VkYy00YTgyLTg5NGQtYmE1MzQ4MTVhOTA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief we put the pedal to the metal on the Fast Saga and everything you need to know about 'F9' (2021)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085407/","name":"Lucas Black"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0117022/","name":"Zachery Ty Bryan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510168/","name":"Shad Moss"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604555/","name":"Chris Morgan"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lonely Hearts
Usamljena srca
programme.desc:
Lonely Hearts: Directed by Todd Robinson. With John Travolta, James Gandolfini, Jared Leto, Salma Hayek. Based on the true story, two homicide detectives track Martha Beck and Raymond Martinez Fernandez, a murderous pair known as the "Lonely Hearts Killers" who lured their victims through the personals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0441774/","name":"Lonely Hearts","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIxNGNjZTMtMGM5Ny00MmQ5LWEwODQtYTZkNGY2MjQ1MGM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the true story, two homicide detectives track Martha Beck and Raymond Martinez Fernandez, a murderous pair known as the "Lonely Hearts Killers" who lured their victims through the personals.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0441774/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitarcarl"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dramatized True Crime at it finest!","reviewBody":"This is an excellent film. Filmed in a classic "Film Noir" style, it is both dark and engaging. The script is well written and expertly crafted. The pace is fluid and the characters are well developed.

The score is appropriate and effective. It helps create tension and mood without becoming oppressive as many scores do.

The cinematography is absolutely terrific and creates a dark and intimate view.

All these elements combine to create an excellent environment for what is a truly inspiring cast. It would be difficult to overstate the quality performances of the entire cast. John Travolta was completely convincing as he always is but I think he may have surprised even his most supportive fans. He nailed the part hands down. In one scene he suspects a dead body is possibly hidden in a box and the mood he creates as he approaches and investigates the box is riveting.

But the true star of this movie was without doubt Salma Hayek. She was mesmerizing as Martha Beck, a true masterpiece. She played evil so well it was spooky. Most people who watch this movie are going to really enjoy how carefully she seduces the viewer into her despotic plans. This is certainly one of her finest portrayals and shows she has considerable acting depth. A nasty "femme fatale" may not be a huge stretch for her but she really did a terrific job.

"Lonely Hearts" is not a family movie. There is plenty of blood, boobs and bad language. The movie deals with very heavy themes like suicide and child murder. And to make matters worse for young ones the story is true. Martha Beck and Raymond Fernandez were real monsters and the movie shows more than enough to make that clear to anyone including kids.

I am a big fan of true crime and this film is really great. For me at least, it was one of the best I've seen in a long time. If you are an adult I recommend this film. Dramatized True Crime at it finest!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21046,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-18","keywords":"usa,criminal investigation,murder investigation,detective,murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2058208025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWU5ZWY4ZmEtNTkxMi00MzYyLWJlODctMTAzYzMwNWRhOWI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWU5ZWY4ZmEtNTkxMi00MzYyLWJlODctMTAzYzMwNWRhOWI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the true story, two homicide detectives track Martha Beck and Raymond Martinez Fernandez, a murderous pair known as the "Lonely Hearts Killers" who lured their victims through the personals."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001467/","name":"Jared Leto"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0733149/","name":"Todd Robinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139765/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0733149/","name":"Todd Robinson"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dëmi
programme.desc: Steve Austin, Lynda Boyd. Një ish i burgosur, detyrohet të futet në botën e arteve marciale për të siguruar jetesën. Ai mundohet të futet në rrugë të drejtë dhe me ndihmën e dy asistentëve të tij shpejt arrin majat e suksesit.

programme.title: Dalja

programme.title: Shpata e dragoit

programme.category: Aksion
krim

fantashkence

programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.desc: 2019. Kapiteni i një ekipi të forcave speciale kapet rob nga një organizatë terroriste. Anëtarët e ekipit organizojnë një mision të rrezikshëm shpëtimi dhe bashkojnë forcat t'i mbijetojnë misionit pa lënë asnjë ushtar tjetër pas.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lulebora dhe erashka e fshehtë
programme.desc: Historia e një miqësie të përjetshme. Për t'u mbijetuar normave kulturore të kohës, dy vajza në Kinën e shekullit të 19-të, krijojnë një kod të veçantë komunikimi Një miqësi, që vazhdon edhe me dy pasardhëset e tyre në Kinën moderne.
programme.category: Dramë historike

programme.title: Aty ku migrojnë mjellmat
programme.desc: Jason Lee, Minka Kelly. Kur një specialiste shpendësh shkon në pronën e një fermeri të ve për të shpëtuar disa mjellma, ajo që fillon si një armiqësi midis tyre, shumë shpejt kthehet në diçka krejt tjetër...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Pulëbardha
programme.desc: Annette Bening, Saoirse Ronan, Corey Stoll, Elisabeth Moss. Bazuar në dramë e famshme te Anton Çehov. Një shqyrtim mbi natyrën obsesive të dashurisë, marrëdhënieve të ndërlikuara prindër-fëmijë dhe vlerën e jashtëzakonshme e të mundimshme të artit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Xhej Ti LeRoi
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Laura Dern. Një histori e vërtetë bazuar në gënjeshtrën që tronditi kulturën pop. Nje grua e re kalon vite duke luajtur rolin e JT LeRoy në publik, një personazh letrar enigmatik dhe i dashur, i krijuar nga kunata e saj.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shamia e verdhë
programme.desc: William Hurt, Kristen Stewart, Eddie Redmayne. Një udhëtim përmes Luizianës do të ndërthurë dhe ndryshojë jetët e tre njerëzve të panjohur, të cilët si të përbashkët kishin vetminë...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Kamarierja
programme.desc: 2007. K.Russell. Jenna jeton në një fshat të vogël dhe punon si kamariere në 'Joe's Diner'. E martuar me Earl-in një burrë i papjekur dhe xheloz që ia nxin jetën, ëndërron të kursejë aq para sa të mund të nisë një jetë tjetër gjetiu.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Në familjen Rajli
programme.desc: James Gandolfini, Kristen Stewart, Melissa Leo. Pas vdekjes së vajzës së tyre lidhja e Dagut dhe Lois, po ftohej. Por kur njihen me adoleshenten Mallori, një balerinë klubesh, për ta fillon një sfidë e re, për t'i ndryshuar asaj jetën.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Kyra
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer, Kiefer Sutherland. Pasi humbet punën dhe të ëmën, një njujorkezeje të divorcuar i mbeten pak alternativa për të përballuar jetesën, dhe asnjëra nga ato nuk duket të jetë një mundësi e mirë...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ne të dyja
programme.desc: Sienna Miller. Dy gra me kombësi të ndryshme që përpiqen t'i largohen të kaluarës, formojnë një lidhje të fortë, ndërsa udhëtojnë nga Çikago në Santa Fe për të marrë pjesë në një konkurs kërcimi oriental.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Terapi për psikologë
programme.desc: Josh Peck, Ben Kingsley. Verë e vitit 1994. Luka, sapo ka mbaruar shkollën e mesme dhe i shet marihuanë psikoterapistit të tij. Deri këtu gjërat shkojnë në rregull. Por çdo gjë ndryshon pasi ai bie në dashuri me të bijën e psikoterapistit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Netë në Rodanthe
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Richard Gere, Diane Lane. Dy njerëz, që në të kaluarën kanë pasur probleme në familje, takohen rastësisht me njëri-tjetrin dhe mes tyre nis një romancë, që do t'u ndryshojë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: E shkatërruar
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis, Rebecca Hall. Kur një kritik muzike dhe vejusha e nje këngëtari pranojnë të shkruajnë një biografi për të, bashkëpunimi i tyre i vështirë kthehet në një lidhje që do t'i ndihmojë të fillojnë kapitullin e ri në jetë.
programme.category: Romancë
komedi

programme.title: Surpriza e dashurisë
programme.desc: Një sipërmarrëse e re mendon se ka gjetur burrin e përkryer, por prindërit e saj kërkues nuk e miratojnë. Kur asaj i kthehen ndjenjat për ish të dashurin e gjimnazit, i cili s'ka asnjë arritje në jetë, ata përpiqen ta bindin vajzën e tyre të kthehet tek i.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Mësuesi

programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shteti i lirë Xhons
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey. Fymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta! Gjatë luftës civile në Amerikë, fermeri Njuton Najt, vihet në krye të një force rebele me fermerë e skllevër për të krijuar një shtet fare të vogël brenda Konfederatës.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Xhoda Akbar

programme.title: Ushtari Megan

programme.title: Unë, ti dhe Duprija

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Protagonistja

programme.title: Zjarrfikësit

programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Vafsh në djall, Gëte 2
programme.desc: Zanati i mësuesit ka shumë përgjegjësi për ish-mashtruesin Myller, që detyrohet të hiqet si profesor. Por, problemet e vërteta për të fillojnë kur klasa e tij dërgohet në Tailandë, për të rregulluar reputacionin e shkollës.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vajza të prapa

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Jeto për sot

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të dalldisur

krim

romancë

programme.title: Banana Split
programme.desc: Dy vajza të panjohura bëhen shoqe të ngushta megjithëse kanë një të përbashkët të pazakontë: njëra prej tyre, ka të dashur, ish-të dashurin e tjetrës. Por a mund të rezistojë një miqësi kur në zemrën e dy shoqeve qëndron i njëjti djalë?
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të përjashtuarit
programme.desc: Dy gjimnaziste peshkope planifikojnë hakmarrjen e tyre pasi bien viktimë e shakasë poshtëruese të një prej studenteve me popullore të shkollës.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean luan golf
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: U diplomova...Po tani?
programme.desc: Alexis Bledel, Zach Gilford, Jane Lynch. Një vajzë e sapo diplomuar, detyrohet të rikthehet në shtëpi dhe të jetojë me nënën e saj, ndërkohë që përpiqet të gjejë një punë, njeriun dhe rrugën e duhur në jetë...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Udhëtim me anije
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr., Horatio Sanz. Dy miq të pafat në jetën romantike, hipin në një anije duke menduar se ishte plot me vajza të reja, por që në të vërtetë është një anije homoseksualësh.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: RRRrrrr!!!
programme.desc: Mijëra vite më parë, një luftë qindra vjeçare midis dy fiseve bëhet vetëm e vetëm për... shampo flokësh. Njëri prej fiseve ka futur një spiune në fisin tjetër, por krimi i parë në histori do të kthejë gjithçka përmbys...
programme.category: Në epokën e gurit

programme.title: Tiramisu
programme.desc: Një film nga Fabio De Luigi. Ndonjëherë, pikërisht ajo që nuk ju kishte shkuar kurrë ne mendje, mund të bëhet arsyeja që puna juaj të bëhet një sukses i padiskutueshëm. Me Vittoria Puccini, Fabio De Luigi.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Hijet më të errëta të Elizes
programme.desc: Eliza është një shtëpiake me jetë dhe martesë monotone. Takimi me një fotograf të ri do ta njohë atë me emocione dhe eksperienca të reja, të cilat do të bëhen të rrezikshme kur historia e tyre shkon pranë fundit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Karamelet e djallit
programme.desc: Një piktor dhe familja e tij besojnë se kanë blerë shtëpinë e ëndrave të tyre, por kur ai pushtohet nga një forcë misterioze, ata duhet të luftojnë që të shpëtojnë shpirtrat e tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Biri i krimit
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor. Një i ri miqësohet me një gangster me emër, ndërkohë qe të dy ndodhen në burg. Pasi arrijnë të arratisen dhe të kryejnë disa grabitje spekakolare, ata formojnë një lidhje ku secili ka nevojë për ndihmën e tjetrit...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Djali i askujt
programme.desc: Channing Tatum, Al Pacino. Një polici të ri, i caktohet detyra të ketë nën vëzhgim lagjen ku ka lindur dhe është rritur. Por një sekret i hershëm, rrezikon të shkatërrojë familjen dhe jetën e tij...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Deklarata
programme.desc: 2003. Michael Caine. Një kriminel i Luftes se II Boterore në fshehtesi bën një jetë të qetë. Deri më sot, autoritetet më të larta të shtetit e kanë mbrojtur, por një grup i ri hetuesish do të përpiqet ta vërë para drejtesise.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: MaskëPasqyra
programme.desc: 2005. S.Leonidas. Në një botë imagjinare, ku dy mbretëresha rivale, krijesa të çuditshme ç'nuk bëjnë për të mundur njëra-tjetrën, një vajze 15 vjeçare i duhet të gjejë MaskëPasqyrën për të shpëtuar mbretërinë e për t'u kthyer në shtëpi.
programme.category: Fantazi

programme.title: Parashikimi
programme.desc: 2009. Nicolas Cage, Rose Byrne. Një profesor dhe djali i tij, zbulojnë një letër me numra që parashikojnë një të ardhme të frikshme për tokën. I vendosur për të shmangur katastrofën, ai bën gjithçka për të gjetur një zgjidhje.
programme.category: Apokalips

programme.title: I humburi
programme.desc: 2010. Adrien Brody. Një njeri zgjohet i plagosur rëndë, në fundin e një gremine, pa kujtesë. Shumë shpejt, ai fillon të kuptojë se ç'ka ndodhur, por edhe sikur instinktet e mbijetesës ta nxjerrin gjallë, a do të mund t'i shpëtojë të kaluarës?
programme.category: Mister

programme.title: E Zhdukura
programme.desc: 2012.Amanda Seyfried. Pasi motra e saj zhduket pa asnjë gjurmë, një vajzë e re beson se vrasësi, të cilit ajo i shpëtoi është kthyer sërish. Me policinë që nuk i beson asnjë fjalë, ajo nis të kërkojë të motrën, përpara se të jetë shumë vonë...
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
Hemingway i Gellhorn
programme.desc:
Hemingway & Gellhorn: Directed by Philip Kaufman. With Nicole Kidman, Clive Owen, David Strathairn, Rodrigo Santoro. A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0423455/","name":"Hemingway & Gellhorn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1OTM3OTY0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTY4MDU4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LeonLouisRicci"},"dateCreated":"2012-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not an Easy Assignment","reviewBody":"Good try at combining a study of complex people and a look at the completely incomprehensible war torn twentieth century experienced first hand by the famous authors. Not an easy assignment. 

The suffering of the ravaged and the slaughter of the human race and the love of two volatile writers are given equal time but the subjects are heavy and elusive at best. 

The best one can hope for is a film worthy of the fight against Fascism (that could destroy the spirit in the best of us) and hold our interest in these two interesting people.

Still some insight about journalistic war time coverage comes through and there is some good use of cinema tricks and smooth transitions that helps move it all along at an entertaining clip.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9414,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-05-28","keywords":"war correspondent,writer,divorce,winter war,spanish civil war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0331056/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0821466/","name":"Jerry Stahl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193009/","name":"Barbara Turner"}],"duration":"PT2H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Natalie Wood: What Remains Behind
Natalie Wood: Ostavština
programme.desc: Natalie Wood: What Remains Behind: Directed by Laurent Bouzereau. With Natalie Wood, Natasha Gregson Wagner, Julie Salamon, Robert Redford. Exploring Natalie Wood's life and career through the unique perspective of her daughter, Natasha Gregson Wagner, and others who knew her best." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9435952/","name":"Natalie Wood: What Remains Behind","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGFlZDgyY2MtZTZiMy00NGMxLWE3ZDUtNmM5YTEzNWI1YTU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Exploring Natalie Wood's life and career through the unique perspective of her daughter, Natasha Gregson Wagner, and others who knew her best.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9435952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blanbrn"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great near excellent bio style type doc of a beautiful legend who left us to soon.","reviewBody":""HBO's" latest bio like doc "Natalie Wood: What Remains Behind" is one touching, emotional highlight like doc of a legendary superstar who left us to soon. Even though before my time(and the fact that I haven't watched any of her movies) I knew just what a great that Mrs. Wood was. I know more about her untimely and tragic strange mystery like death in 1981, still after watching this doc I feel now more than ever informed and respect her talent, beauty, and grace even more. Done and narrated with interviews provided by her daughter Natasha Gregson Wagner this is one eye opening film of her late mom's love and beauty. As the footage includes never before seen home movies with family and friends and interviews with costars like Robert Redford, and most telling and heart touching is the sit down interview with Natasha's stepdad "Daddy Wagner"(Robert). As it's clear after being married twice to Natalie he never lost his love for her. The film is also telling of Natalie's mommy issues and struggle with her sibling, and it shows how she fought for women's work rights in the studio system from a young age. And footage shows her many loves with famous men, as by the age of 25 she had already been nominated for three Oscars. Thru all of this it's overshadowed by her tragic unexplained mystery like apparent drowning death in 1981 after the Thanksgiving holiday at the young age of 43. Really great loving engrossing documentary that celebrates a beautiful legendary screen queen that left us to soon.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1242,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2020-05-05","keywords":"biographical,child star,studio system,celebrity,famous person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3632971289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk2NGJiMzMtNGZlOS00NDVlLTkzYzUtYjliYjg4MTZkNDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk2NGJiMzMtNGZlOS00NDVlLTkzYzUtYjliYjg4MTZkNDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Natalie Wood: What Remains Behind is an intimate portrait of actor Natalie Wood’s life and career, told through the eyes of her daughter Natasha Gregson Wagner and others who knew her best."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000081/","name":"Natalie Wood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0906031/","name":"Natasha Gregson Wagner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757515/","name":"Julie Salamon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0100522/","name":"Laurent Bouzereau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139821/"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
Čarobnjak za laži
programme.desc:
The Wizard of Lies: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Robert De Niro, Diana Henriques, Nathan Darrow, Alessandro Nivola. The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1933667/","name":"The Wizard of Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIxOTMxNzc1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgyOTUxMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1933667/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"admin-22725"},"dateCreated":"2017-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Big Short It Is Not","reviewBody":"An interesting attempt to weave a story line on the Madoff ponzi scheme but one that in the end is disjoint, incomplete, and largely unsatisfying. It certainly falls far short of other great financial movies – the Big Short, Margin Call, and Smartest Guys in the Room, to name a few. Worth watching but not likely a movie to savor, add closure, provide moral assurance, or make you feel anything. Too many moving pieces that lack grounding – the timeline has no center and the flashbacks and jumps forward are too disjoint, too many supporting characters are painted as morally ambiguous, and the many defrauded clients are nameless and faceless. 

As for the some of the details, it's hard to get around Michelle Pfeiffer accent. It may be spot-on but the voice is just annoying. Add in Robert De Niro's unbalanced intonations and a discordant soundtrack and sound-editing and it is not a movie that will sit well with your ears.

It should have been done as a 3-4 part mini-series. They would have had a lot more time to not only relay the full time line and details of the case but also go into the many interesting sub-stories and tragedies. For example, the efforts of Harry Markopolos to unmask the fraud is addressed only by showing Bernie and Ruth watching 30 seconds of testimony on the TV in their condo. The questions of the hundreds of millions potentially transferred to London accounts for the benefit of Madoff relatives is not explored. The ineptitude of the SEC, FINRA and other agencies is also given short-shrift. Did you know that Shana Madoff, the chief compliance officer and niece of Bernie Madoff, married an Assistant Director of the Office of Compliance Investigations and Examinations at the SEC. They met in 2003 when he was performing an examination as to whether Madoff was running a Ponzi scheme. The SEC Director of Compliance Investigations and Examinations attended their wedding in 2007. 

As it is, the movie dips its toe into the $64.8B (yes $64.8 billion) fraud case and provides some insights as to who in the inner circle may or may not have been culpable– all in the course largely telling a family drama. Interesting and entertaining, yes. A good film, meh. Disappointing for what it could have been, most definitely.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-05-20","keywords":"financial fraud,financier,ponzi scheme,fraudster,fraud","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tonight 8/7c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi42121497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Bernie Madoff and his Ponzi scheme."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063961/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506094/","name":"Sam Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2331718/","name":"John Burnham Schwartz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345603/","name":"Samuel Baum"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Robert De Niro (role=Bernie Madoff), Diana Henriques (role=Diana B. Henriques), Nathan Darrow (role=Andrew Madoff), Alessandro Nivola (role=Mark Madoff), Michael Kostroff (role=Peter Madoff), Kathrine Narducci (role=Eleanor Squillari), Michelle Pfeiffer (role=Ruth Madoff), Steve Coulter (role=Martin London), David Lipman (role=Martin Flumenbaum), Kelly AuCoin (role=Agent Cacioppi), Don Castro (role=Agent Kang), Amanda Warren (role=SEC Investigator)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1933667, Title: The Wizard of Lies, --- Description: The Wizard of Lies: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Robert De Niro, Diana Henriques, Nathan Darrow, Alessandro Nivola. The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1933667/","name":"The Wizard of Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIxOTMxNzc1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgyOTUxMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1933667/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"admin-22725","dateCreated":"2017-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Big Short It Is Not","reviewBody":"An interesting attempt to weave a story line on the Madoff ponzi scheme but one that in the end is disjoint, incomplete, and largely unsatisfying. It certainly falls far short of other great financial movies – the Big Short, Margin Call, and Smartest Guys in the Room, to name a few. Worth watching but not likely a movie to savor, add closure, provide moral assurance, or make you feel anything. Too many moving pieces that lack grounding – the timeline has no center and the flashbacks and jumps forward are too disjoint, too many supporting characters are painted as morally ambiguous, and the many defrauded clients are nameless and faceless. 

As for the some of the details, it's hard to get around Michelle Pfeiffer accent. It may be spot-on but the voice is just annoying. Add in Robert De Niro's unbalanced intonations and a discordant soundtrack and sound-editing and it is not a movie that will sit well with your ears.

It should have been done as a 3-4 part mini-series. They would have had a lot more time to not only relay the full time line and details of the case but also go into the many interesting sub-stories and tragedies. For example, the efforts of Harry Markopolos to unmask the fraud is addressed only by showing Bernie and Ruth watching 30 seconds of testimony on the TV in their condo. The questions of the hundreds of millions potentially transferred to London accounts for the benefit of Madoff relatives is not explored. The ineptitude of the SEC, FINRA and other agencies is also given short-shrift. Did you know that Shana Madoff, the chief compliance officer and niece of Bernie Madoff, married an Assistant Director of the Office of Compliance Investigations and Examinations at the SEC. They met in 2003 when he was performing an examination as to whether Madoff was running a Ponzi scheme. The SEC Director of Compliance Investigations and Examinations attended their wedding in 2007. 

As it is, the movie dips its toe into the $64.8B (yes $64.8 billion) fraud case and provides some insights as to who in the inner circle may or may not have been culpable– all in the course largely telling a family drama. Interesting and entertaining, yes. A good film, meh. Disappointing for what it could have been, most definitely.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-05-20","keywords":"financial fraud,financier,ponzi scheme,fraudster,fraud","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tonight 8/7c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi42121497","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Bernie Madoff and his Ponzi scheme.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063961/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506094/","name":"Sam Levinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2331718/","name":"John Burnham Schwartz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345603/","name":"Samuel Baum"],"duration":"PT2H13M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bolt
Grom
programme.desc:
Bolt: Directed by Byron Howard, Chris Williams. With John Travolta, Miley Cyrus, Susie Essman, Mark Walton. The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0397892/","name":"Bolt","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQyNDE5NjQ1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDExMTAwMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0397892/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jonconnormustlive-46298"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A fun action packed Disney adventure","reviewBody":"Bolt follows a canine actor known for playing a super hero on a TV show, he is supported from his owner and must find his way back to her, all while believing he truly has super powers.

Bolt is loads of fun! There are lots of creative action scenes, plenty of funny jokes, and even some emotional scenes. Bolt has the makings of a Disney classic, but it does come up a little short of the usual Disney magic.

Firstly, the story lacks depth, the story basically tells itself in the first 30 minutes, then fuels the rest with action, comedy and drama. Secondly Miley Cyrus proved to be an annoying choice for voicing one of the main characters, not only is she an ear-sore, but she struggles to express different emotions vocally, her voice feels fake and just detracts from the overall film.

Luckily there's still plenty good in Bolt, it's definitely a great choice for a family friendly action comedy!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":199422,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2008-12-17","keywords":"dog,cat,hamster,reference to tiger beat magazine,time bomb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bolt: Theatrical Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3253338393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MDIwODc0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MDc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MDIwODc0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MDc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first theatrical trailer for Bolt, directed by Byron Howard and Chris Williams."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1415323/","name":"Miley Cyrus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261435/","name":"Susie Essman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397174/","name":"Byron Howard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930261/","name":"Chris Williams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930261/","name":"Chris Williams"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0330373/","name":"Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI1NDMyMjExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTc4MjQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0330373/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AetherTheory"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shortest 2.5 hour movie","reviewBody":"Mike Newell is forgiven for cutting out so much detail from the book, and JK Rowling is forgiven for writing wonderfully rich books. However, fans of the book cannot help but feel like riding a roller coaster that is so fast there is no time to enjoy the ride. I predict the huge void between book and movie will spur remakes in about 10 to 20 years. Even if the movies must be 5 hours long, Harry Potter fans are willing to sit through them. This movie doesn't get a 10 because it leaves me feeling like something is missing, but it does deserve a 9 for being the best possible portrayal of the book given a 2.5 hour limitation. All said and done, this is the shortest 2.5 hour movie I have ever watched.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":577895,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2005-11-23","keywords":"tournament,wizard,magic,school of magic,heroism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2611740953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY3NzkxMjMtZjMwNy00OTYwLWJhNDktZDgwZDZmMzZmOWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY3NzkxMjMtZjMwNy00OTYwLWJhNDktZDgwZDZmMzZmOWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914612/","name":"Emma Watson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001565/","name":"Mike Newell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176128/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460141/","name":"Steve Kloves"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K.
